sub_title: Senior Marketing, Branding & Project Management Professional | AgilePM®| Agile Coach ICP-ACC®| Facilitator ICP-AFT®| Trainer | Speaker
summary:
Julita Davies, AgilePM®, ICP-AFT™, ProductOwner™, ScrumMaster™, Certified Facilitator & Trainer
Senior business strategist leveraging a strong academical background with broad experience in digital marketing strategy, project management and communication to drive large-scale complex digital activities, process improvements and agile transformations in an international environment. 

A dynamic self-starter and motivator with a track record of translating business needs into executable strategies. Partnering with senior-level decision-makers and cross-functional teams to help them envision the business possibilities as they digitally modernize and transform their organizations and ways of working.

Experienced team coach and trainer. Professional speaker and certified facilitator with excellent communication skills – a confident brand ambassador who can motivate teams and collaborate with all stakeholders. Passionate about mentoring young professionals.

Award-winning Public Speaker and member of Toastmasters International since 2014.

Owner of STAR & BRAND Consultancy for digital marketing and project management services
and JulitaDavies.com for Personal Branding and Career Brand Management consultancy, training and keynote presentations.

projects.title: e-Nordic and Nordic CIO Summits 2003-2009
projects.description: The annual e-Nordic and later Nordic CIO Summit offer the perfect setting for sponsors to present their products and services directly to the key decision makers and gate keepers of the largest Nordic and Baltic IT budgets. Over three days, sponsors meet and interact with top IT executives through a number of business one-to-one meetings and many networking activities. In addition, sponsors will attend the strategic summit sessions led by the thought leaders in the CIO and IT community. This exclusive, networking event presents a unique opportunity to develop meaningful and valuable business relations.

profile_positions.description:
End-to-end responsible for simultaneously managing and planning complex, omnichannel content creation projects for global propositions on the Consumer Marketing roadmap. 
Managing project execution with a 360 approach to ensure effective management of scope, timings, budget, resources and to act upon risks and issues in a controlled way, with an audience focus. 
Responsible for guiding the project team through the full creation and production process, bringing speed and agility to the project by effective communication and implementing optimal ways of working.
Additionally, part of the Philips Agile 360 Team and Train the Trainer program.
Key responsibilities:
• driving the end-to-end execution of marketing projects within Consumer Marketing roadmap
• serving as linking pin to connect the Engagement & Creation team, Packaging team and Production & Deployment team to successfully manage projects end-to-end
• liaising with relevant project stakeholders and to align on project scope, required deliverables and execution strategy
• formulating project plan in consultation with core project team and key stakeholders, to set up for success and deliver on time and quality
• organizing project resources both internally and externally 
• assessing potential risks and developing mitigation strategies to keep the project within budget and on time, while maximizing value creation of the creative output and effectively manage risks and issues as they occur
• reporting out to business management and Program Manager with regular performance status on project level, variances to plan and identification of corrective actions
• managing full project budget and provide detailed forecast on upcoming 2Q’s
• driving project progress using applicable project management methodology (gated and agile ways of working) and tools: Trello, Kanban, Jira
• raising the bar on quality, effectiveness, efficiency and speed to market on project level, ways of working and agility

profile_positions.title: Corporate Trainer | Agile Trainer | Agile Coach

profile_positions.description:
Independent project manager and project consultant for scale-ups and corporates in areas of product and brand marketing, digital marketing, digital business strategy, social media strategy, platform business model, agile project management and agile transformation. 

My areas of expertise:
- project management
- digital marketing
- digital asset management
- digital business strategy 
- digital platform business model 
- agile transformation, agile project management
- digital transformation and change management
- competence management for Industry 4.0
profile_positions.title: Owner - Digital Marketing & Project Management (Freelance, Interim)

profile_positions.description:
As a personal branding trainer and consultant, I bring a unique blend of marketing, communication, and psychology expertise to help individuals and organizations cultivate their brands for success and fulfillment. My services include customized corporate trainings and one-on-one consultations that guide clients in crafting their unique brand identity, personal narratives, and leveraging their strengths to achieve their professional goals. With a focus on authenticity and strategic storytelling, my approach helps individuals and teams build lasting relationships, increase visibility and influence, and unlock their full potential. 

As an award-winning speaker and author of the top-rated Personal Branding course on Udemy, I am committed to providing accessible and impactful learning opportunities worldwide. My course offers practical exercises, real-life examples, and actionable insights that empower individuals to take ownership of their professional development and achieve their career aspirations through effective personal branding.

Check out my Personal Branding online course on Udemy consisting of 15 lectures, over an hour of video material and complementary worksheets: 
http://bit.ly/coursepersonalbranding
or contact me at contact@julitadavies.com if you are interested in one of my services.

Services:
Personal Branding &  Career Brand Management
- trainings & workshops
- keynotes and presentations
- personal 1-on-1 consultancy
- virtual seminars
profile_positions.title: Personal Branding Coach, Trainer & Speaker

profile_positions.description: Leading, coordinating, and monitoring all marketing activities. Responsible for marketing and digital marketing strategy, communication and content creation and management. Overseeing the redesign of company website offering a better user experience, as well as implementing new MarTech tools from CRM system to database and marketing automation. Overseeing social media strategy and promotional campaigns. Supporting the organisation, promotion and on-site activities for the PSEW Conference and trade show.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Project Manager (Interim)

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Digital Marketing Strategist and Product Owner, manage all digital marketing activities (B2B and B2C) and strengthen the corporate brand. Accountable for driving and monitoring digital transformation, digital marketing roadmap, social media strategy, sourcing and implementation of new digital tools and solutions in collaboration with the development team (Agile PM and Scrum), liaising with all stakeholders, and cooperation with creative and PR agencies. Brand ambassador and speaker at industry conferences and forums.
- Redesigned and relaunched company website offering an improved user experience with 36% increased traffic and 41% increase in people spending >3 minutes on the website.
- Redesigned and implemented new social media strategy with increased engagement (335% on Facebook and grew Instagram to 70k followers in 2 years) and conversion and 30% lower expenditure, making Kobelco Europe the strongest division for social media and a point of excellence for other divisions internationally. 
- Assisted in setup and droll-out of the e-commerce platform and design of its marketing and promotional activities, achieving its financial KPI's within its first 12 months.
- Sourced, developed and rolled-out a new digital asset management tool. Delivered extensive team training including creating manual and training materials for final users. 
- Implemented new Marcom and reporting tools that simplified communication channels with partners and customers and enabled in-house tracking of opening rates, content read, links clicks and conversion.
- Spearheaded business strategy and agile project management of the second-hand machinery platform from feasibility to final deployment.
- Developed and presented monthly reports for marketing and e-commerce (statistics, conversions, trends) as well as for digital projects (deliverables and deployment).
- Drove digital transformation and digital tools rollouts by designing and facilitating internal training.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager (Digital Projects/Product Owner)

profile_positions.description:
Oversaw end-to-end digital marketing strategy (including defining the customer journey, social media strategy, online advertisement, weekly content management and e-mail campaigns), and design and production of online customer communication. Accountable for delivery of regular management information, statistics, and analytics.
- Drove business transition to a solely online educational platform model business with a highly active community.
- Co-designed the loyalty program (gamification, reward system). 
- Improved user experience and increased conversion. 
- Sourced new marketing automation system and designed sequence email marketing strategy based on user behaviour that converted 1500 attendees to a physical event.
- Developed test strategies to optimize online effectiveness and delivered on-going improvements to digital strategy and execution for acquisition, retention, and growth across all digital media.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all aspects of eMarketing including web content management, online branding, social media (engagement, monitoring, analytics - Google Analytics), planning and  coordination of online and offline marketing activities, product campaigns as well as overseeing all related IT and technical issues. 
Managing remotely based team, providing training programs to other departments, preparing presentations, guidelines and manuals.
Liaising between various departments (Production, Operations, Design, IT) in order to create web content and implement improvements allowing clients better online experience and customer service.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of eMarketing

profile_positions.description: Responsibilities as above for EMEA region
profile_positions.title: Head of eMarketing/Senior Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for product management during the product life cycle; overseeing process of development, production, market introduction and sales;  organizing and coordinating marketing promotional campaigns, product introduction via e-channels and media as well as liaising with in-house designers and suppliers.
Additionally responsible for event on-site management, branding, pre and post market research, reports and statistics

company.name: Polish Professional Women in the Netherlands

volunteer_experiences.description:
Polish Professional Women in the Netherlands is an association uniting active internationally-minded Polish female professionals and entrepreneurs living and working in the Netherlands.
It is a platform for the exchange of knowledge, experience, and support for the personal and professional development of members. The association organizes tailor-made trainings and workshops, as well as high-profile networking events. 
Website: www.polishprofessionalwomen.com
I am C3 Area Director for  District 59 of Toastmasters International. Appointed as of 1st of July 2019 for a period of one year to serve as a liaison officer between the clubs and district.

Social Responsibility Program 'We share because we care'
volunteer_experiences.description: I am taking part in the social responsibility program 'We share because we care', sharing my skills, knowledge and experience in public speaking with non-profit organisations, to contribute to the improvement of the presentation skills of others.
